title: Diary of a private investor: ‘Which of the three possible Brexit scenarios will be the best bet for share buyers?’
text:
In theory, we are now very close to a very dramatic moment: Britain’s departure from the European Union on Oct 31. If this event actually takes place, it will be a big deal for investors – a noisy, crunchy moment when a lot of money is won and lost.

But we all remember that only six months ago we seemed to be in a similar situation. Then too we were coming up to the moment of truth on March 31 and history was postponed. How likely is it that history will be given a rain-check again?

Looking at the punter-to-punter betting website Betfair Exchange, I see that the weight of money thinks that Brexit will be delayed a second time. The odds against Britain leaving the EU this year are two to one,...
description: In theory, we are now very close to a very dramatic moment:
